from django.urls import path,
path,
include

urlpatterns = [
    path('', main_view),

    # Home page
    path('home/', home_view),
         path('home/login/', login_view),
         path('home/signup/', signup_view),

    # Dashboard page
    path('dashboard/', dashboard_view),
         path('dashboard/overview/', overview_view),
         path('dashboard/transactions/', transactions_view),

    # Chart page
    path('chart/', chart_view),
         path('chart/balance-chart/', balance_chart_view),
         path('chart/interactive-data-points/', interactive_data_points_view),

    # Settings page
    path('settings/', settings_view),
         path('settings/account-information/', account_information_view),
         path('settings/security-settings/', security_settings_view),
         path('settings/notification-preferences/', notification_preferences_view),
]

# Handle missing values and convert 'Date of death' column to datetime format.

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

def create_histogram(data):
    data['Week'] = data['Date of death'].dt.to_period('W')
    groups = data.groupby('Week')['Deaths'].sum()
    groups.plot(kind='bar')
    plt.show()
